subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: {{lang|zh|甯}} is considered a variant character of {{zh-l|寧}} in Mainland China. Before the endorsement of usage of variant character in surname in {{lang|zh|中华人民共和国国家通用语言文字法 }}(2000), the official simplified form was {{lang|zh|宁}}. In {{lang|zh|通用规范汉字表}} (2013), {{lang|zh|甯}} becomes the standard form for the surname sense. Nevertheless, in Mainland China, {{lang|zh|宁}} is still common used for the surname sense today, where {{lang|zh|甯}} is uncommon.
